title: Dishonorable
body: Hey guys, i ve been banned 3 months ago and im still dishonorable. I guess there must be something wrong with this, could u help me please :)

replies.body: Well your summoner name is pretty inappropriate, so that's not helping your cause.  :P  I flagged your account for a rename, definitely consider something more appropriate as you continue on your honor journey.  The speed of your honor progression will depend on consistency in playing honorably.  Bad games can slow you down, and I do see a recent match that could have been a little nicer.  Hope that helps, and good luck!
